SKT_FIRST.name: Sparkling Water Bomb
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: スパークリングウォーターボム
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. When an enemy is killed on the caster's turn, has a <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> chance to grant an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color> to the caster.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 자신의 턴에 적을 처치하면 <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 획득합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。自分のターンに敵を倒した時、<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Surprise Sand Castle
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: サプライズサンドキャッスル
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, then steals <color=#28d9ed>all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> of the target.\nWhen the target is a <color=#28d9ed>Boss</color> or is not granted a <color=#28d9ed>buff</color>, activates an additional attack.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격 후 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>모두</color> 빼앗습니다.\n대상이 <color=#28d9ed>보스</color>이거나 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>가 없으면 추가 공격을 입힙니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与えた後、対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>すべて</color>奪う。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>ボス</color>か、<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がない場合、追加攻撃を与える。

5_jp: 強化効果を奪う効果を強化(攻撃前に適用)
強化効果を奪う効果を強化(効果抵抗無視)

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 強化攻撃に変更\nダメージUP

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Grand Summer Escape
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: グランドサマーエスケープ
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When the target is not granted a dispellable <color=#28d9ed>buff</color>, reduces cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Surprise Sand Castle</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, then attacks the enemy. This skill ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.\nAfter attacking, reduces all of the target's <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource</color> count. (Ignores the target's Resilience and Immunity)
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 대상이 해제 가능한 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 가지고 있지 않다면 <color=#28d9ed>서프라이즈 샌드 캐슬</color>의 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킨 후 적을 공격합니다. 이 스킬은 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 무시합니다. \n공격 후 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원</color>의 수량을 모두 감소시킵니다. (대상의 효과저항 및 면역 무시)
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 対象に解除可能な<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がない場合、<color=#28d9ed>【サプライズサンドキャッスル】</color>のスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させた後、敵単体にダメージを与える。このスキルは対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視する。\n攻撃後、対象の<color=#28d9ed>固有資源</color>の数をすべて減少させる。(効果抵抗および免疫無視)

5_jp: 【サプライズサンドキャッスル】の\nスキルターン初期化

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>5</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>5</color>의 WG를 추가로 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、WGを追加で<color=#28d9ed>5</color>DOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
